Desc.entry: Group for those aged 50 years and over. Activities include: scrabble group (see separate entry), strollers group, card group, coffee meeting, book group, luncheon club, outings and theatre groups. Annual subscription.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Mon in the month 10am-12.30pm (monthly meeting, small charge for attendance)

category.entry: CLUBS FOR OLDER PEOPLE - POSTAL DISTRICT 35
